titles.title: A bill to rename the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 3/11/2015--Introduced. Designates the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, as the "Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center."
